org.relationlearn.util

Class TextUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.relationlearn.util.TextUtils

  • public class TextUtils
extends Object
    Utility class used to manipulate text in order to aid any TextFilter implementation in its job if needed.
    See Also:
    TextFilter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Pattern WORDS_PATTERN
      Pattern compiled with the regex "\w+".

      Splits a unique String into tokens using the Pattern provided by p.
      static String[] getWordsFromText(String text)

    • Method Detail

      • getWordsFromText

        public static String[] getWordsFromText(String text)
        Splits a unique String containing a text into and array of Strings that contain words, using the Java regex \w+.
        Parameters:
        text - the original text to split
        Returns:
        the input text splitted in an more easy to manipulate way for TextFilter implementations
        See Also:
        TextFilter

      • getTokensFromTextUsingRegex

        public static String[] getTokensFromTextUsingRegex(String text,
                                   Pattern p)
        Splits a unique String into tokens using the Pattern provided by p.
        Parameters:
        text - the original text to tokenize
        p - the Patter to use for tokenization
        Returns:
        the input text splitted in tokens using p
        See Also:
        Pattern

      • getTokensFromTextUsingFactory

        public static String[] getTokensFromTextUsingFactory(String text,
                                     TokenizerFactory factory)
        Splits a unique String into tokens using the TokenizerFactory factory.
        Parameters:
        text - the original text to tokenize
        factory - the TokenizerFactory to use for tokenization
        Returns:
        the input text tokenized using the TokenizerFactory factory
        See Also:
        TokenizerFactory
